title: Private Sport Fishing
body: We offer a wonderful fishing trip for groups small and large. Smaller groups can easily join our 47 person fishing boat and head out to look for Rockfish, Seabass and Ling Cod. You can also private charter a 65' deep-sea fishing boat for full or half day fishing trips. Rod, bait, tackle, and fishing licenses can all be provided, and staff is on hand to help you "catch on" and clean your fish! This is a very popular trip especially in the summer months, so if you are interested please book early.
